name: Find It! (venitherich)
description:
A fast-paced memory game where you try to remember a set of items shown. How many will you remember ?

Rules:

The game consists of two phases:

  • In the first phase, you are shown a set of items and you need to memorize them. You can use your mouse to move the items around.
  • In the second phase, you need to select the items you were shown in the previous phase. You can also type parts of the word to filter the items.
